main event: Crew aboard USS Comstock observed three bright objects of differing shapes and sizes ascend almost vertically until they disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., The objects appeared to be self-luminous and unrelated to any known aircraft., Observers reported a brilliant red-orange exhaust trail during the sighting., The information was gathered as part of Project 10073 under Project Blue Book., Further investigation may be warranted to gather additional information.
witness description: Richard J. Callahan, CDR.USN Duty Officer, Naval Aviator and Thomas G. Green, VF-21 L.T. and Legal Naval Aviator, Observer
